If I'm interpreting the CVS change history correctly, line 261 corresponds to
line 259 in the HEAD stream. It looks like we're getting null from
IFile.getLocation().

IResource.getLocation() says it can return null, so we should handle it. I 
imagine this can happen if your project was out of synch with the filesystem.
Added code to handle the null case in AntLaunchShortcut. Please verify, DarinS.
